channel.title: Dieing Emote
channel.description: When people die in my server their is no emote, they just tele to spawn, can someone give me a decent code for a dieing emote and , tell me where i add it ? thanks guys. i use hybrid pvp

item.title: Dieing Emote
item.dc:creator: @Joseph69 Joseph69
item.description:
@Joseph69 wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:6, topic:447525”]He has absolutely no clue what he is talking about.

Add the death animation at the bottom of the giveLife() method. in PlayerAssistant[/quote]dude help please, still not emote when people die ??

Read full topic

@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

He has absolutely no clue what he is talking about.

Add the death animation at the bottom of the giveLife() method. in PlayerAssistant

item.title: Dieing Emote
item.dc:creator: @Joseph69 Joseph69
item.description:
@Joseph69 wrote:

[quote=“jummppy, post:4, topic:447525”]ok where u edit the player respawn location when he first logs in i think config.java find the location he dies at other words mypos edit it to ur location then add the animation[/quote]public static final int RESPAWN_X = 3095; // when dead respawn here
public static final int RESPAWN_Y = 3472; - what i do now ?
